articles.title: For JEE Mains, A Russian Allegedly Hacked Software For Cheating: 10 Facts
articles.description: The national entrance exam, JEE Mains, which determines the fates of lakhs of students was compromised last year, the CBI said today, as it interrogated a Russian man who was allegedly at the centre of the scam.
articles.content: • In 2021, the Russian, Mikhail Shargin, hacked into the software for the exam which was provided by world-renowned TCS or Tata Consultancy Services, said sources in the CBI this evening.
